thread.title: EXCLUSIVE: New York Red Bull forward Lloyd Sam gets Ghana invite for Canada friendly

title: EXCLUSIVE: New York Red Bull forward Lloyd Sam gets Ghana invite for Canada friendly
text:
Sports News | 10 October 2015 18:10 CET EXCLUSIVE: New York Red Bull forward Lloyd Sam gets Ghana invite for Canada friendly - www.ghanasoccernet.com Lloyd Sam 
Ghana coach Avram Grant has handed a late call-up to New York Red Bulls winger Lloyd Sam for Tuesdayâ€™s international friendly against Canada in Washington DC, GHANAsoccernet.com can exclusively announce. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
